summary_text: A reptilian professor (Albert Lupo) restores a scarred singer's (Susanne Loret) beauty with serum from the dead.

name: The Gallant Hours
summary_text: A semi-documentary dramatization of five weeks in the life of Vice Admiral William F. "Bull" Halsey, Jr., from his assignment to command the U.S. naval operations in the South Pacific to the Allied victory at Guadalcanal.

name: Ever Since Eve
summary_text: Lecherous bosses make it difficult for an attractive secretary to keep jobs, so she decides to appear considerably more homely in hopes of holding onto work.

name: Furlough
summary_text: When an inmate is granted one weekend out of prison to see her dying mother, a rookie correction officer struggles to keep her under control.

name: Tabagheye hasas
summary_text: After an unexpected incident happens for a middle-aged man's dead wife's corpse, he gets very depressed, anxious and violent.

name: Rewind
summary_text: A team of military field operatives and civilian scientists must use untested technology to travel back in time to alter past events in order to change the future and avoid a devastating terrorist attack.

name: Direct Action
summary_text: Frank Gannon, a veteran cop, is being hunted by his fellow police officers after they learned he has betrayed the brotherhood and exposed to the feds wide scale corruption of the LAPD. He has one day left to prove his case and survive.

name: Concorrenza sleale
summary_text: Two textile traders, with the shop close to one another, fight for the supremacy of their own business during the racial laws in Italy.

name: Times Square
summary_text: Two ill-matched teenage girls form a punk band and soon have New York City by its ears.

name: Gunslinger
summary_text: After her husband is gunned down, Rose Hood takes his place temporarily as Marshal of a small Western town.

name: Indu Sarkar
summary_text: Indu Sarkar is set during the emergency period between 1975 to 1977 declared by Prime Minister Indra Gandhi.

name: Amour Fou
summary_text: Berlin, the Romantic Era. Young poet Heinrich wishes to conquer the inevitability of death through love, yet is unable to convince his skeptical cousin Marie to join him in a suicide pact. ...                See full summary »

name: The Color Out of Space
summary_text: A boy, looking for his missing father, travels to Germany and uncovers a haunting legacy that a meteorite left behind in the area. Based on H.P. Lovecraft's short novel "The Color Out of Space."

name: Ilya Muromets i Solovey Razboynik
summary_text: Ilya Muromets has to rescue his trusty horse Burushka and Kiev treasury from the greedy hands of famous bandit, Solovey-Razboynik.

name: The Bodyguard
summary_text: A hapless bodyguard is fired from his client's son for the death of his clients father. The son is then hunted by assassins who do not want him to inherit his fathers company.

name: Lewis Black: Black on Broadway
summary_text: Lewis Black goes on tirade after tirade about stupidity in America. He covers everything from corporate greed and Martha Stewart to WMDs and homeland security

name: Just Looking
summary_text: It's 1955 and curious 14-year-old Bronx kid Lenny has a mission for his summer: to witness two adults in the midst of an "act of love." When his mother sends him to Queens to stay with his ...                See full summary »

name: Hellgate
summary_text: A motorcycle gang kidnaps a young woman, Josie, from a diner and brutally kills her. Many years later, the girl's father finds a magic crystal that can bring the life back to dead objects. ...                See full summary »

name: Rosa Luxemburg
summary_text: After years of political agitation, Rosa Luxemburg, Karl Liebknecht, and Leo Jogiches form a revolutionary German party, the Spartacists.

name: The Witches
summary_text: Five short stories loosely dealing with the roles of women in society.

name: The Awful Dr. Orlof
summary_text: Dr. Orlof, a former prison doctor, abducts beautiful women from nightclubs and tries to use their skin to repair his daughter's fire-scarred face.

name: Saddle the Wind
summary_text: Steve Sinclair is a world-weary former gunslinger, now living as a peaceful rancher. Things go wrong when his wild younger brother Tony arrives on the scene with his new gun and pending bride and former saloon girl Joan Blake.

name: Loro chi?
summary_text: At 36, David has a one and only ambition: to win the respect of the president of the company he works for and, in the process, to get a better position with the substantial salary increase ...                See full summary »

name: Days of Darkness
summary_text: Humanity makes its last stand as zombies emerge to take over the world in this cinematic tale of gore and chaos.

name: You Shoot, I Shoot
summary_text: During a slack period, contract killers market their business as a consumer experience.

name: Il mestiere delle armi
summary_text: The history of the first victim of modern artillery and its moving agony, amidst conspiracies and betrayals of the powerful. Life and death of Giovanni De' Medici, a young brave captain in ...                See full summary »

name: Zone Troopers
summary_text: In Italy, during World War II some American soldiers find an alien UFO.

name: Horror Hospital
summary_text: Two British companions who met on a train heading to the rural countryside stay with a bizarre host of characters in a secluded, curious mansion. Unknown to them, there is a sinister secret behind closed doors.

name: Colonel Wolodyjowski
summary_text: In 1668 Polish colonel Michael Wolodyjowski, who recently retired to a monastery, is recalled to active duty and takes charge of Poland's eastern frontier defenses against invading Tatar hordes and Ottoman armies.

name: Il medico della mutua
summary_text: The eventful ascent of a doctor in the corrupted Italian healthcare system.

name: The Atomic Submarine
summary_text: Ships mysteriously disappear on route across the Arctic Sea, and a specially-equipped submarine is sent to investigate.

name: Kralj Petar I
summary_text: King Petar The First, as a young man is banished from Serbia Many years later, he returns to his country to liberate its people and secure parliamentary democracy and starts the reconstruction of Serbia.

name: Dersimiz: Atatürk
summary_text: Tarihci Dede is giving information to a couple of children about Mustafa Kemal Atatürk's success and his way to shape todays Turkey.

name: A Timeless Christmas
summary_text: Charles Whitley travels from 1903 to 2020 where he meets Megan Turner and experiences a 21st Century Christmas.

name: Hammer of the Gods
summary_text: Thor along with his friends travel to a mysterious island seeking glory and fame. Upon arriving they encounter strange creatures and they start searching the island for answers. Meanwhile ...                See full summary »

name: Albino Farm
summary_text: College students exploring the Ozark Mountains for a school assignment, stumble upon a group of scary, redneck cave-dwellers.

name: Truands
summary_text: A Parisian criminal gang fall apart after challenges to the gang's leader lessen his influence.

name: El mar
summary_text: Two young men and a woman who shared the same traumatic childhood experience during the Spanish Civil War are reunited years later at a hospital for tuberculosis treatment.

name: Rumble in Hong Kong
summary_text: Ho Mei Fong is a young woman in trouble, running from a gang of criminals with something of importance hidden in her purse. She dies in Chien Chen's taxi while trying to escape, but not ...                See full summary »

name: Breaking In
summary_text: Professional thief Ernie takes Mike on as an apprentice, but while Mike clearly has "larceny in his heart", it will take him a long time to get as good as Ernie.

name: Lips of Blood
summary_text: Frederick sees a photograph of a ruined seaside castle, which triggers a strange childhood memory. He then goes on a strange quest to find the castle and the beautiful woman who lives there.

name: Themroc
summary_text: Made without proper language, just gibberish and grunts, this is an absurdist comedy about a man who rejects every facet of normal bourgeois life and turns his apartment into a virtual cave.

name: Buona Sera, Mrs. Campbell
summary_text: Carla Campbell receives maintenance payment from three former soldiers who all believe themselves to be the father of her daughter, Gia.

name: If I were a boy
summary_text: Jeanne wakes up one morning and her life is about to take a funny turn, at first sight nothing has changed in her - to a small detail.

name: Luv Ka the End
summary_text: Rhea, the girl next door falls in love with Luv Nanda, only to find out he is not as nice as she thought he was. She decides to get even with Luv Nanda.

name: Frits en Freddy
summary_text: Frits and Freddy Frateur make their living as bible salesmen. When ringing the doorbell of Carlo Mus, who is under surveillance by secret service, both men are laughed at while closing the door.

name: Putham Pudhu Kaalai
summary_text: Putham Pudhu Kaalai brings together 5 of the most celebrated directors in Tamil cinema - Sudha Kongara, Gautham Menon, Suhasini Mani Ratman, Rajiv Menon, and Karthik Subbaraj to create Amazon Prime Video's first Indian anthology film

name: Meitantei Conan: Suiheisenjyou no sutorateeji
summary_text: A murder was committed on a ship. To solve the case, Conan will need to open a case from 15 years ago.

name: Kein Bund fürs Leben
summary_text: Basti, doesn't want to go to the Bundeswehr and writes a denial. But as his mate who fancies Basti's girlfriend "forgets" to send the denial Basti is taken in by the Bundeswehr- What seemed to be a nightmare soon becomes a funny adventure.

name: Decko koji obecava
summary_text: A normal boy receives a blow to the head which sets him off to do rebellious acts.

name: Alice Through the Looking Glass
summary_text: A modern adaptation of the classic children's story "Alice Through the Looking Glass" written by Lewis Carroll and John Tenniel, which continued on from "Alice's Adventures in Wonderland". ...                See full summary »

name: Personal Services
summary_text: The story of the rise of a madame of a suburban brothel catering to older men, inspired by the real experiences of Cynthia Payne.

name: The Mysterians
summary_text: Shortly after a giant robot destroys a village, aliens from outer space arrive offering friendship. Will the people of Earth tie these two events together?

name: Person to Person
summary_text: Follows a variety of New York characters as they navigate personal relationships and unexpected problems over the course of one day.

name: Pokémon the Movie: Hoopa and the Clash of Ages
summary_text: When Ash, Pikachu, and their friends visit a desert city by the sea, they meet the Mythical Pokémon Hoopa, who has the ability to summon things-including people and Pokémon-through its ...                See full summary »

name: Bis
summary_text: Two friends, who are not very satisfied with their current lives, go back accidentally to the 1980s to fix their professional and sentimental future.

name: Härmä
summary_text: On the West Coast on Finland in nineteenth-century Ostrobothnia. Esko is the leader of a local gang of troublemakers and an uneven battle ensues over the estate, honor a father's last wishes.

name: Alois Nebel
summary_text: A train dispatcher encounters a mute stranger who appears out of nowhere, and finds himself mysteriously involved with a murder in Poland.

name: What We Wanted
summary_text: A couple facing fertility issues finds their marriage tested on a vacation to a Sardinian resort - and the family next door only adds to the tension.

name: Zomerhitte
summary_text: 14 months after loosing his partner while making a UNICEF documentary in Afghanistan, Dutch photographer Bob Griffioen's benefactor Federico Federici has landed him a National Geographic ...                See full summary »

name: Josh and S.A.M.
summary_text: After their parent's divorce, 12-year-old Josh and 7-year-old Sam decide to go on an underage road trip. Sick of being ferried between their distant mother and remarried father, Josh and his brother steal a car and set out for Canada.

name: She
summary_text: In a post-apocalyptic world, She aids two brothers' quest to rescue their kidnapped sister. Along the way, they battle weird creatures before standing against the odds to defeat the evil Norks.

name: Raggedy Man
summary_text: A divorcee with two sons has an affair with a young sailor passing through her Texas town in 1944.

name: Last Hurrah for Chivalry
summary_text: A son tries to avenge his father, and gets two sword fighters to help him.

name: Midareru
summary_text: After a bombing raid destroys the family store and her husband, Reiko rebuilds and runs the shop out of love stopped short by destruction.

name: Sons and Lovers
summary_text: A young man with artistic talent lives in a close-knit coal-mining town and finds himself inhibited by his emotionally manipulative mother.

name: The Big Lift
summary_text: Experiences of two Air Force sergeants during the 1948 Berlin Airlift.

name: Evelyn Prentice
summary_text: The neglected wife of a high profile attorney dallies with a unscrupulous womanizer and finds herself involved in blackmail and murder.

name: Rosie
summary_text: The story of a mother trying to protect her family after their landlord sells their rented home and they become homeless.

name: Behind You
summary_text: Two young sisters find that all the mirrors in their estranged aunt's house are covered or hidden. When one of them happens upon a mirror in the basement, she unknowingly releases a malicious demon.

name: The Memory Book
summary_text: A budding photographer seeks out the same true love she finds in an old photo album.

name: Usagi doroppu
summary_text: A man adopts his six-year-old aunt and raises her as his own kid.

name: Moonlight & Mistletoe
summary_text: A young woman who left the year-round holiday party of "Santaville" - where her dad reigns as the resident St. Nick - returns to find her father's business in dire straits.

name: The Trial
summary_text: After the horrific death of his wife and two sons, suicide seems to be the only escape for a small town attorney, until he's assigned a capital punishment case that begins to transform his life.

name: The Mark of Cain
summary_text: Uses detailed research and explosive new testimonies by soldiers who have served in Iraq to tell an emotional fictional story of two young men very much out of their depth.

name: Blood Dolls
summary_text: Virgil, an eccentric freak billionaire, spends his days being a "biological inventor." The "blood dolls," his newest creation, aid him in getting revenge on those who betrayed him.

name: Restless Natives
summary_text: Two Scottish friends become local folk heroes and tourist attractions when they start holding up tour buses with novelty items.

name: Shao Lin men
summary_text: A survivor of an attack on a rebel group opposing the Manchu invasion of China creates the Goose Fist fighting technique and tries for revenge on a traitor.

name: The McKenzie Break
summary_text: During WW2, German POWs in Britain plot to escape from their prison camp in Scotland.

name: From Hell It Came
summary_text: A wrongfully accused South Seas prince is executed, and returns as a walking tree stump.

name: Nobody Lives Forever
summary_text: Ex-GI Nick Blake gets involved in a scheme to fleece a rich, young widow, but finds himself falling for her, much to the displeasure of his racketeer cohorts.

name: The Island
summary_text: A cataclysmic event causes a man, who dreams of winning the lottery, to become stranded on an island with his co-workers.
